title: Software Developer
points: Designed a rule-based content-matching framework for eInvoices, reducing country-specific implementation efforts by 70%.
Developed a pagination-based data retrieval algorithm that improved system efficiency by reducing SAP queries from 10,000 eInvoices per request to all eInvoices in a single request.

title: Associate Software Developer
points: Led critical legal and feature updates for Document Compliance tax solutions from design to development.
Overhauled error-handling in the SAP DRC solution for Turkey, reducing customer incidents by 80% and improving customer satisfaction by 66%.
Spearheaded the integration of Data Protection and Privacy (DPP) protocols into the SAP Document Consistency solution to ensure secure data handling and compliance.
